BYS Honor Code
Each participant is expected to demonstrate in their behavior (dress, speech, and actions), attitudes that reflect the gospel of Jesus Christ. Involvement in any kind of behavior or activity contrary will result in immediate dismissal from the Spectacular.

Dress and grooming should always be modest, neat, and clean. Clothing should be modest in fabric, fit, and style. "Grubbies" are not appropriate. Clothing which is sleeveless, strapless, or revealing is not acceptable. Skirts and shorts must be knee length, and slits in dresses must not extend above the knee. Earrings may only be in the ear and may not be worn by males. Facial hair is not permissible for young men. Extreme hair colors/styles are not acceptable. All electronic devices, iPods, mp3s, and cell phones (except for counselors for emergencies) are prohibited.
